column4: when i browse /media via filesystem, i see my external (which is not connected), cdrom(shortcut), and cdrom (no shortcut).. all are 4kb and clicking any of them opens a blank folder
i tried menus view-->reload and nothing changes
i think that just means they're unused mount points, 4kb is the size of an empty directory
usually the points/'folders' don't display unless something's loaded/mounted/connected whatever
